explains: n. （法律上或道义上的）义务，责任；恩惠，人情债；（承诺付款等的）合同，契约；必须要做的事情
wordGroup: moral obligation 道义上的责任
legal obligation n. 法律义务
contractual obligation 合同义务；契约责任
financial obligation 债务；财政承担

sentences.en: She did not feel under any obligation to tell him the truth.
sentences.cn: 她觉得没有义务告诉他实情。

sentences.en: Governments have at least a moral obligation to answer these questions.
sentences.cn: 政府至少在道义上有责任回应这些问题。

sentences.en: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it.
sentences.cn: 老师布置家庭作业时，学生们通常感觉做作业是一种义务。
